caption.p: (a) ATI model of the Si(110)-(16 × 2) surface. The atoms of the first, second and third layers are marked in blue, green and white, respectively. Adatoms and pentamer atoms are marked in red. (b)–(e) Calculated constant-current STM images using the model shown in (a). (b), (d) U = +1.0 V. (c), (e) U = −1.0 V. The unit cell is outlined in (a), (b) and (c). The image size in (d), (e) is 150 × 150 Å 2.
